speaker: SOLDIER
text:
The
               
              gods
               
              make
               
              this
               
              a
               
              happy
               
              day
               
              to
               
              Antony
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Would
               
              thou
               
              and
               
              those
               
              thy
               
              scars
               
              had
               
              once
               
              prevailed

speaker: ANTONY
text:
To
               
              make
               
              me
               
              fight
               
              at
               
              land
              .

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
Had’st
               
              thou
               
              done
               
              so
              ,

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
The
               
              kings
               
              that
               
              have
               
              revolted
               
              and
               
              the
               
              soldier

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
That
               
              has
               
              this
               
              morning
               
              left
               
              thee
               
              would
               
              have
               
              still

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
Followed
               
              thy
               
              heels
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Who’s
               
              gone
               
              this
               
              morning
              ?

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
Who
              ?

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
One
               
              ever
               
              near
               
              thee
              .
               
              Call
               
              for
               
              Enobarbus
              ,

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
He
               
              shall
               
              not
               
              hear
               
              thee
              ,
               
              or
               
              from
               
              Caesar’s
               
              camp

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
Say
               
              “
              I
               
              am
               
              none
               
              of
               
              thine
              .
              ”

speaker: ANTONY
text:
What
               
              sayest
               
              thou
              ?

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
Sir
              ,

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
He
               
              is
               
              with
               
              Caesar
              .

speaker: EROS
text:
Sir
              ,
               
              his
               
              chests
               
              and
               
              treasure

speaker: EROS
text:
He
               
              has
               
              not
               
              with
               
              him
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Is
               
              he
               
              gone
              ?

speaker: SOLDIER
text:
Most
               
              certain
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Go
              ,
               
              Eros
              ,
               
              send
               
              his
               
              treasure
               
              after
              .
               
              Do
               
              it
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Detain
               
              no
               
              jot
              ,
               
              I
               
              charge
               
              thee
              .
               
              Write
               
              to
               
              him
              —

speaker: ANTONY
text:
I
               
              will
               
              subscribe
              —
              gentle
               
              adieus
               
              and
               
              greetings
              .

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Say
               
              that
               
              I
               
              wish
               
              he
               
              never
               
              find
               
              more
               
              cause

speaker: ANTONY
text:
To
               
              change
               
              a
               
              master
              .
               
              O
              ,
               
              my
               
              fortunes
               
              have

speaker: ANTONY
text:
Corrupted
               
              honest
               
              men
              .
               
              Dispatch
              .
              —
